--- title: R, it's OK I guess author: Ken date: '2018-04-05' slug: r-it-s-ok-i-guess categories: - R tags: - rstats ---

On a dare from @dataandme and @littlemissdata, last night I bought the domain ritsokiguess.site, and now this blog lives there (as well as at the old nxskok.github.io, which is the “actual” home for the site). I used, extensively, Brooke Watson’s guide, for which many thanks. There seems to need to be a two-way connection between where the static website actually lives, and where it looks to the outside world as if it lives.

I guess I now have to call my blog “R, it’s OK I guess”, which would be a delicious ironical thingy.
